items.sentence: Tom told Mary that he was going to show her how to do that.
Tom told his students that there would be a quiz on Monday.
We\'re going to invite Tom and Mary to our Halloween party.
I\'m trying to stop Tom from doing something really stupid.
I\'ve advised Tom to do that before he goes back to Boston.
I\'ve already told Tom everything I think he needs to know.
I don\'t know about the others, but as for me, I\'m for it.
I don\'t know how many more times I\'ll be able to do this.
I don\'t know the reason why Tom and Mary don\'t get along.
If you really want a challenge, you should try windsurfing.
